item.description:
BOSTON MEETUP , FUNMeetup & CampMeetup Presents Fun Meetup Getaway, Aug.14th Sports&FUN,Socializing&Relaxation, SAVE $50 with FUN MEETUP when booking

Join us for this fun weekend,

You Can Do It All...Or Nothing At All.
From mountains and a sparkling lake to tennis courts and softball fields, Getaway is a 300-acre playground with every game and adventure under the sun. We've recruited top professional athletes and instructors to teach you everything from biking, tennis and kayaking to yoga, wine tasting and dance.

How you spend your weekend is completely up to you. You can pack every minute with sports and adventure, sleep late and lounge by the lake all day, or mix things up with a little bit of everything. Just be sure to save enough energy for some evening playtime, too

http://BostonMeetupGe... click on Book Now to the right and choose Aug. 14th!

Summer at its best! Join us for an amazing weekend, parties, friends, laughing, dancing, waterfront, and everything else, the fun weekend becomes an incredible getaway!!!!

Any questions, call me @ 917-868-4268 !

Call and text me friday night @ 917-868-4268@ the boathouse for your free drink booklet and remember to mention Boston Meetup, Camp Meetup or Fun Meetup when booking to save $50 and get the free drink book!

http://BostonMeetupGe... , click on Book Now to the right and choose Aug. 14th!
item.how_to_find_us: call & text Greg @ 917-868-4268 Friday Night @the boathouse welcome party for your free drink book (after typing or mentioning Camp Meetup or Fun Meetup when booking) , meet us at the welcome party friday night at the boathouse"
